scripts.build-all: concurrently "yarn workspace @haaretz/app-utils build" "yarn workspace @haaretz/graphql-server build" "yarn workspace @haaretz/htz-react-server build" "yarn workspace @haaretz/htz-user-utils build" "yarn workspace @haaretz/htz-components build" "yarn workspace @haaretz/login build"
scripts.dev: cross-env concurrently "cross-env NODE_ENV=development graphql-server" "cross-env NODE_ENV=development htz-react-server login | bunyan -L"
scripts.dev:2prod: cross-env concurrently "cross-env NODE_ENV=production graphql-server" "cross-env NODE_ENV=development CONNECTION_PRESET=dev2prod htz-react-server login | bunyan -L"
scripts.start: cross-env concurrently "cross-env NODE_ENV=production graphql-server" "cross-env NODE_ENV=production htz-react-server login | bunyan -L"
scripts.start:dev2stage: cross-env concurrently "cross-env NODE_ENV=development graphql-server" "cross-env CONNECTION_PRESET=dev2prod NODE_ENV=production htz-react-server login | bunyan -L"
scripts.start:dev2prod: cross-env concurrently "cross-env NODE_ENV=production graphql-server" "cross-env CONNECTION_PRESET=prod NODE_ENV=production htz-react-server login | bunyan -L"
scripts.start:dev: cross-env concurrently "cross-env NODE_ENV=production graphql-server" "cross-env CONNECTION_PRESET=dev NODE_ENV=production htz-react-server login | bunyan -L"
